Articles.Content: Is there any way to re add the old explosion effects from pre 0.25? The current one feels to cartoony for me.
Having not played (or maybe I don't remember it, pretty sure I simply didn't play that version) pre-0.25, I'm wondering out of curiosity, what did the explosion effects look like back then?
Best example I could find, lost my old copy of 0.24
Hello? Anyone know how to do this?
If you have an old copy of ksp, access the files and find the explosion texture, replace the new one with the old one
